Git Branching

To create a new branch locally

bash $ git checkout -b "new-branch-name" Switched to a new branch "new-branch-name"

To create a new local branch from a remote branch

bash $ git checkout -b new-branch-name origin/remote-branch-name Switched to a new branch "new-branch-name"

Push a New Local Branch to a Remote Git Repo

bash $ git push origin new-branch-name

To view your local branches

bash $ git branch

To view all branches (local and remote)

bash $ git branch -a

To view all remote branches

bash $ git branch -r

To merge a branch check out the branch you'd like to merge to and run

bash $ git checkout master $ git merge new-branch-name

To push all local changes to remote

bash $ git push origin

To push local changes for a specific repo

bash $ git push origin master

View GUI of merges

bash $ gitk
